original_text: For this is what the Lord says about the sons and daughters born in this land and about the women who are their mothers and the men who are their fathers:
korean_text: 이 곳에서 낳은 자녀와 이 땅에서 그들을 해산한 어머니와 그들을 낳은 아버지에 대하여 여호와께서 이와 같이 말씀하시오니

sentences.original_text: For this is what the Lord says
about the sons and daughters born in this land
sentences.korean_translation: 이 땅에서 태어난 아들들과 딸들에 대하여

sentences.original_text: and about the women who are their mothers
and the men who are their fathers
